body.name: PURE ERA Carpet Stair Tread Landing Mat Ultra Plush Shag Soft Tape Free Self Adhesive Non Slip Skid Resistant Indoor Doormat Area Rug Floor Mat for Kitchen Bathroom Workstations Washable 2' X 3'
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 12 hrs 23 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: No Adhesives but Cling Firmly: The carpet stair tread has a backing coated with a special gel, which could cling filmy to your flat and smooth stairs like magic. No tapes, adhesives, staples, or glue required; Simply place the mat on a clean smooth flat surface and press firmly. The mat will remain securely in place until you need to uplift it. It can be re-positioned again and again, without the use of any additional adhesives.

Soft & Stylish: The luxurious textures of these lush shug stair landing mat features uber-plush floor coverings (0.8” thick pile) in a simple solid deep brown, made using soft yet durable polyester for easy-care, long-lasting beauty. Dimension: 2 Ft. x 3 Ft.(1 Piece), fits most indoor home stairs perfectly.

Multi-Purpose: Stair Landing Mat - Place it on the your intermediate landing or bottom step of a stair to create a safer, more secure walking surface, and allow your family and pets to easily go up and down your slippery and steep hardwood stairs, by reducing the likelihood of slips and falls; Doormat - Deliver it behind the entrance door to welcome your guests to your home into your home with a stylish entryway look.
Bathroom Mat - In the bathroom to absorb water and protect your feet from cold bathroom floor; Kitchen Rug - In the kitchen to absorb water and dries quickly, to protect your kitchen from stain.

Easy installation & Clean: Clean and dry your floor first; remove the backing cover; simply place your comfort rugs on your staircase and go. This mat is washable and reusable. If you’d like to clean it, just remove it from your floor first; hand wash in cold with mild detergent and then replace it to your floor naturally after air-drying.
body.description: Everyone loves a beautiful hardwood stairway, but even the most attractive stairs can be slippery for anyone in the family, including pets, elders and kids. PURE ERA carpet stair treads landing mat can add safety to your steps, protect your hardwood stairs from wear and tear, not to mention an extra layer for warmth and comfort. With simple solid design, it easily complements the natural beauty of your floors and home. Multi-purpose: can be used as stair landing mat, doormat, kitchen rug and washroom mat Durable and long-lasting Reducing wear over time Material: 100% Polypropylene Backing: Tape free, non-slip, no residue after installation Dimension: 2 Ft. x 3 Ft.(1 Piece)Available in 6 colors: Deep Brown, Brown, Light Grey, Dark Grey, Dark Beige, Off white Machine washable in cold for repeated use Simple solid decorative design looks great on most floors Designed for indoor use only NOTE: All mat sizes are approximate. Due to the difference of monitor colors, some colors may vary slightly.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 125 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #160,902 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #1,354 in Area Rugs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mat!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for the landing in our 5th wheel and it worked out perfectly! The peel off backing is easy to remove and placement of the mat is super easy. It’s sturdy and stays in place. The carpet is plush and feels nice and soft. Compared to others, it’s plush and thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Durable
reviews.reviewText: I bought these stair treads to make it easier for my dog to go up and down the stairs. They were more expensive than a lot of other stair treads, but worth every penny. They are super soft and comfortable, and, more importantly, my dog loves them! The bullnose part that wraps around the front of the steps doesn't adhere that well, so I used a staple gun to tack them into place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and soft but not square.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to match my stair treads, it is very plush and vacuums well but I have to hold it with one for because of the suction. The only complaint it is not perfectly square but I do not believe anyone will notice so I kept it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice landing mat.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this landing mat along with a set of stair treads. The mat is a little more plush than the treads and the nap is a little different, but not real issue. Works well and stays in place on hardwood stairs without any adhesives or tacks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wish they held up better
reviews.reviewText: I loved these treads and the rugs that match them...until the 'rug' part separated from the backing/adhesive part. I tried to contact the company to see if there was something I could do to keep the new ones I ordered (yes, I loved them so much I bought more, even after I knew they would separate), from separating. Much to my disappointment, the company never got back to me.Even though I love how they look and feel, I won't be purchasing any more and their customer service is nonexistent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works great for safety and comfort
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something thick and soft at the bottom of my stairs. We have small children and intended to use the rug as an additional safety measure as the floor at the bottom of the stairs is hard and not carpet. It also stays put when we step down, sometimes while holding a baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable under foot
reviews.reviewText: These treads are comfortable under foot. They help prevent you from slipping on the stairs and make it easier for my dogs to get down the stairs.I found them to be a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These look and feel great. They are very soft. Easy to use. I suggest subbing your hand under the peel to remove backing slowly. It tears easily when trying to go too quickly. My only complaint is that a third or more have very bent edges. The metal is uncomfortable to step on. I was able to flatten them a little but not as much as I’d like. It’s definitely not a deal breaker and they are much more comfortable than other stair treads I’ve purchased. Overall, they are great for this price.
